description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A first person shooter with avatars, featuring fast deathmatch gameplay on eight maps with jumppads, teleporters and a proven arsenal of energy weapons. Compete with other players in online multiplayer sessions or practice offline versus bots.
description.short: A first person shooter with avatars, featuring fast deathmatch gameplay on eight maps with jumppads, teleporters and a proven arsenal of energy weapons. Compete with other players in online multiplayer sessions or practice offline versus bots.
